data.description:
Welcome to Puzzle Path, an exergame that transforms rehabilitation into a fun and engaging experience! In Puzzle Path, players advance by moving their bodies, making it a perfect fit for rehabilitation centres and physical therapy sessions. This game is specifically designed to help patients perform therapeutic exercises in a controlled and enjoyable environment.

The innovative approach of Puzzle Path helps motivate patients during their rehabilitation journey. The game is played using 'parallel walking bars,' a tool commonly found in rehabilitation centers to assist patients with mobility training. Players move through the game by walking, collecting puzzle pieces along the way to complete a series of vibrant puzzles.

Three Unique Puzzle Themes

Puzzle Path offers three captivating themes of puzzles to collect, providing variety and keeping players engaged throughout their therapy sessions. Each theme introduces new visuals, making the rehabilitation process both stimulating and entertaining. The playful nature of collecting puzzle pieces encourages patients to keep moving, with every step bringing them closer to completing their puzzle.

**(!) Puzzle Path is part of the larger HoloMoves package, a subscription service offering a wide variety of exergames specifically designed for rehabilitation and physical therapy. Get a personal license and learn more at www.holomoves.nl/en**
